text:
Hello!!
Great news about your biology papers!! Well done. I hope you are happy as well.
There is so much I would like to tell you about the world of finance....
First, there is for sure a future for ACCA accountants, a big future!! I am looking for four currently in my own team as an example!!

What makes a big difference is the industry you work in. It makes a difference on how ACCA accountants are viewed inside a company and they work with other finance people in the same company. 
I will try to explain this tomorrow night. 
I have worked in a bank and after that in technology companies where it is very very dynamic also for accountants. I am now in an healthcare/technology company and it is even more dynamic. 
I will carry on tomorrow because it is a wide topic and I want to put some structure to it for you.
